comments.body:
prettier fixes this line to

```
function (e) {
```

but `dtslint` complains saying

```
> dtslint types "@rails/ujs"

Error: /Users/f_subal/Development/DefinitelyTyped/types/rails__ujs/rails__ujs-tests.ts:36:69
ERROR: 36:69  space-before-function-paren  Spaces before function parens are disallowed

    at /Users/f_subal/Development/DefinitelyTyped/node_modules/dtslint/bin/index.js:206:19
    at Generator.next (<anonymous>)
    at fulfilled (/Users/f_subal/Development/DefinitelyTyped/node_modules/dtslint/bin/index.js:6:58)
```
